Articles.Content: I recently bought a new laptop with a 15.6 inch 1080p display that is capable of running KSP at 1080p. At 1080p, the flight interface on KSP is so small, the numbers are difficult to read with the laptop sitting in my lap. Is it possible to add an interface scaling option for high dpi displays?

The flight interface is the only part you can scale right now, though the Application Launcher (stock toolbar) doesn't scale.

Go to Settings > General and slide the Flight UI Size to the right. I use "Largish" on my 23" monitor.
